mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_progress (student_id, course_id, chapter_id, current_position, duration, is_finished) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{courseId}, #{chapterId}, #{currentPosition}, #{duration}, #{isFinished}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE current_position = VALUES(current_position), duration = VALUES(duration), is_finished = VALUES(is_finished)
mapper.select: SELECT p.course_id as courseId, p.chapter_id as chapterId, p.current_position as currentPosition, p.duration as duration, p.is_finished as isFinished, c.course_name as courseName, ch.title as chapterTitle FROM course_progress p LEFT JOIN course_info c ON p.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN chapter ch ON p.chapter_id = ch.id WHERE p.student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY p.is_finished ASC, p.course_id DESC
